column2: Dingdingding! You are correct! You four may leave.
L-let's get out of here, fast.
Sir Olly, wait! Just four of us? Someone is missing!
Oh dear… Oh dear oh dear oh dear…
Sir Olly…! I'm sorry, but we've got to go rescue my brother!!
Oliver. You take Rose. I'll go with Tito. We'll be back.
Bring back my apprentice in one piece, please.
